pages.text: The maid's skin is completely customizable, you can easily switch the maid's skin in the game.$(br2)you can add a third-party resource pack to increase the style of the maid's skin.

Just use the $(l:https://blockbench.net/)Blockbench$(/l) software to create your own maid skin resource pack very easily. $(br2)Maid skin model is perfectly compatible with the 1.10.0 version of the bedrock edition entity model.$(br2)For more information on custom maid skins, check out the wiki.
